name: Late Payment Rate Over time
query:
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC(
    'Month',
    (
      SELECT
        LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
          WHERE
            EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice')
        )
    )
  ) AS "Invoice Clearing Date",
  COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date"
      )
  ) / COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NOT NULL)
  ) * 100 AS "Payment Rate"
FROM
  "defaultview-529"
WHERE
  EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Post Invoice' ~> 'Clear Invoice')
ORDER BY
  1 ASC NULLS FIRST FILL TIMESERIES('Month')
description: Average Time from Posting till Clearing for all Invoices, that were cleared after Net Due Date
signalFragment:
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC(
    'Month',
    (
      SELECT
        LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
          WHERE
            EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice')
        )
    )
  ) AS "Invoice Clearing Date",
  COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date"
      )
  ) / COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NOT NULL)
  ) * 100 AS "Payment Rate"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
WHERE
  EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Post Invoice' ~> 'Clear Invoice')
ORDER BY
  1 ASC NULLS FIRST FILL TIMESERIES('Month')
